org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Interface UpgradeTask

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUpgradeTask

    public interface UpgradeTask
    An upgrade task.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  UpgradeTask.TaskType
      Defines the different types of upgrade tasks.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void end(UpgradeContext context)
      Notifies this task that the upgrade has completed.
      void interact(UpgradeContext context)
      Interacts with the user where needed (e.g.
      void perform(UpgradeContext context)

    • Method Detail

      • end

        void end(UpgradeContext context)
         throws ClientException
        Notifies this task that the upgrade has completed. This method will be invoked after all upgrade tasks have completed successfully. Most task implementation will not need to do anything.
        Parameters:
        context - Context through which tasks can interact with the server installation.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If an error occurred while performing the task.

      • perform

        void perform(UpgradeContext context)
             throws ClientException
        Performs this upgrade task.
        Parameters:
        context - Context through which tasks can interact with the server installation.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If an error occurred while performing the task.

      • start

        void start(UpgradeContext context)
           throws ClientException
        Notifies this task that the upgrade is about to start. This method will be invoked before any upgrade tasks have been performed. Most task implementation will not need to do anything.
        Parameters:
        context - Context through which tasks can interact with the server installation.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If an error occurred while starting the task.

      • verify

        void verify(UpgradeContext context)
            throws ClientException
        Verifies that this upgrade task can be completed or not.
        Parameters:
        context - Context through which tasks can interact with the server installation.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If the upgrade cannot proceed.

      • interact

        void interact(UpgradeContext context)
              throws ClientException
        Interacts with the user where needed (e.g. in order to ask for confirmation), and throw a ClientException if the upgrade cannot proceed.
        Parameters:
        context - Context through which tasks can interact with the server installation.
        Throws:
        ClientException - If the upgrade cannot proceed.
